title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 550.6 - Offenses and penalties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 550.6 - Offenses and penalties

State Regulations

Violations, evasions, falsifications, omissions, destructions, alterations, mutilations, and such other offenses as may be
proved in connection with the rules, regulations, orders or amendments thereof
of the department shall be punishable by fine and/or imprisonment as well as
being subject to such civil penalties as are provided by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
550.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
